# Documentation

This directory contains user guides, reference docs, maintainer notes, and test reports for `mcp-browser`.

## Start here

- Install + first run: `docs/guides/INSTALLATION.md`
- Common issues: `docs/guides/TROUBLESHOOTING.md`
- Uninstall / cleanup: `docs/guides/UNINSTALL.md`

## Guides (user-facing)

- Quick reference: `docs/guides/QUICK_REFERENCE.md`
- AppleScript fallback (macOS): `docs/guides/APPLESCRIPT_FALLBACK.md`
- Safari extension: `docs/guides/SAFARI_EXTENSION.md`
- Releases: `docs/guides/releases/RELEASE.md`, `docs/guides/releases/RELEASE_QUICK_REFERENCE.md`

## Reference

- Project organization: `docs/reference/PROJECT_ORGANIZATION.md`
- Architecture: `docs/reference/CODE_STRUCTURE.md`
- MCP tool surface (authoritative tool names + schemas): `docs/reference/MCP_TOOLS.md`
- Documentation standards: `docs/STANDARDS.md`

## Developer / maintainer

- Maintainer guide: `docs/developer/DEVELOPER.md`
- Implementation notes and historical summaries: `docs/developer/`

## Testing / evidence

- Uninstall test report: `docs/testing/UNINSTALL_TEST_REPORT.md`
- Uninstall usage examples: `docs/testing/UNINSTALL_USAGE_EXAMPLES.md`

## Specs

- Product / PRD notes: `docs/prd/`

## Archive

Historical or superseded docs live in `docs/_archive/` and are not maintained.
